input1: "Happy Mother's Day to the most incredible mom! Your unwavering support and love have shaped me into the person I am today. I cherish every moment we spend together, from our heartfelt conversations to our silly adventures. Thank you for being my guiding light and my best friend. I hope your day is filled with all the joy you bring to our lives!"
